mapper.insert: insert into food_order(orderId, userId, address, realName, phone, ticketId, cheap, orderTime, orderStatus) VALUES (#{orderId},#{userId},#{address},#{realName},#{phone},#{ticketId},#{cheap}, NOW(),1)
mapper.update: update food_order set totalCount=#{totalCount}, totalPrice=#{totalPrice}, actualPrice=#{totalPrice}-cheap where orderId=#{orderId}
mapper.select: select * from food_order where userId=#{userId} order by orderTime desc
select * from food_order where orderStatus=1 order by orderTime
mapper.update: update food_order set deliverId=#{deliverId}, deliverName=#{deliverName}, deliverPhone=#{deliverPhone}, orderStatus=2 where orderId=#{orderId}
mapper.select: select * from food_order where deliverId=#{deliverId} and orderStatus=2 order by orderTime
mapper.update: update food_order set orderStatus=3, finishTime=NOW() where orderId=#{orderId}
update food_order set orderStatus=1, deliverId=null, deliverName=null, deliverPhone=null where orderId=#{orderId}
update food_order set orderStatus=5 where orderId=#{orderId}
mapper.select: select * from food_order where deliverId=#{deliverId} order by orderTime
mapper.update: update food_order set complaint=1 where orderId=#{orderId}
mapper.select: select sum(amount) from food_view_food_order where to_days(orderTime) = to_days(now()) and foodId=#{foodId}
